column4: My feisty has fallen over. on boot I get a kernel panic and the caps lock and scroll lock flash. how can I get it back?
what does the error message with the kernel panic say?
Um, cant remember, Im on the machine in question at the moment wuth the live CD, any way to access the data on the installed OS?
well you can try mounting the filesystem on your harddisk and see if there is anything in /var/log/syslog
